website_summaries.verdict: You’ll pay up a little here, but what you’ll get is a high-quality, professional-looking rack that displays your magazines instead of just storing them.
pros: Slim design with a sleek, professional look
Sturdy and easy to mount with the enclosed hardware
cons: Some customers report that this option arrives damaged or bent
Many say they felt the rack would be larger

customer_reviews.title: Great Comic book holder
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses to display he unread comic books. He really loves this gift. Not too heavy but great quality. Great gift idea for comic book collectors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Francis

customer_reviews.title: Document Holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this magazine rack! We are using it our school as a document holder outside of our office. It holds schedules, forms and any other document students may need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Up and out of the way
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for our gym to organize magazines for guests. It blends in well on a pillar in the gym and allowed us to replace a floor standing rack with this one opening up floor space for our members.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Super happy! Great business Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Sleek and sturdy, works perfectly in small room. Keeps down clutter. Can only fit about 4 or 5 magazines or two books in each compartment. So it's perfect to keep up to date magazines and not any bulk! Love it! Very happy. Won't hesitate to order again! Item arrived in three days
customer_reviews.author: Little Miss

customer_reviews.title: 5++ Great Display Item
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product but I am very sad that I have to return it. The magazines (Life etc.) I want to display are vintage and are wider than this item. I even contacted the companyto see if they have anything that would accommodate these magazines and unfortunately they do not. Very sadly I had to return the item but I still rate it a 5++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged product was damaged would have worked just fine if it had not been damaged
customer_reviews.text: This came in a damaged box and was too damaged inside to be of use. It was snapped in the mesh and was sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Eden Scheans

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for all my husbands car magazines and looks great in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, but consider better wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hardware is rather low quality, specifically the wall anchors - I did not use them, I felt like I was going to break them. Other than that, I LOVE the product. It's sturdy and holds a good amount of magazines for its size.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great looking magazine rack!
customer_reviews.text: Great magazine rack. Looks great and priced right. Glad I mad the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This rack was purchased to hold file folders for various members of the family. The top opening is wide and can hold several magazines. The other openings are narrower, could hold probably only one magazine. They are perfect for a folder filled with papers for family members. It's a little smaller than I anticipated, but it works perfectly for us in the space we designated. So, just read the dimensions and make sure you're aware of the size. Overall, it's a great product. It's sturdy, functional, and looks good. I think I'm remembering correctly that it has a guide to use for hanging on the wall and it comes with plastic wall anchors, as well.
customer_reviews.author: b525

customer_reviews.title: Great product! So many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Great organizing idea! Saw one of these on an office organization site. Works great! Put your projects in order of urgency with a note attached and you won't have them lost in a stack! Great if you have a little memory trouble too! :-) could also organize by day or date etc.
customer_reviews.author: G and S Mattern

customer_reviews.title: It came pretty badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: It came pretty badly damaged. I pounded it out with a rubber mallet and it was a good enough repair that I kept it. Installation was more difficult than it had to be so I drilled out new holes for the screws. Once installed, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Good looking
customer_reviews.text: I liked this rack so much that I ordered 3 more for my office and the corporate office followed suit by order 4 for themselves. This is a perfect way to get all those brochures and other paperwork off of the table tops. This product is easy to install and is very well made. Certainly worth the price if not more!
customer_reviews.author: Chadd R. Castrilli

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I lucked out and didn't get a product that wasn't crushed or had holes in the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, made strong n well
customer_reviews.text: This metal rack is strong n built well. Easy to hang comes with screws. Love this n works great for home schooling. Would buy again for sure but won't have to too. This will last.
customer_reviews.author: TarajM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for literature organizers for our office and was so happy with it I ordered another one for our magazines in the front. Hopefully these will keep us from losing important paperwork that gets picked up off the printer and will keep the waiting area nice and organized. Very well built product that was so easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: teresainacoma

customer_reviews.title: The best magazine rack for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I use this magazine rack in the lobby of my Barber Shop...it is the perfect item for using in small spaces and it hold lots of magazines and they stay neatly organized all day...even with people looking at them all day...everyone makes nice comments about the magazine rack...
customer_reviews.author: Debsie

customer_reviews.title: slim and sturdy. I will probably buy one for our other ...

customer_reviews.title: As expected, easy install
customer_reviews.text: I like when I get what I see and expect.

customer_reviews.title: Even better File holders than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These file holders worked out for my classroom better than I thought. We decided to try these in our classroom for student folder cubbies. They were super easy to hang. Very sturdy and a lot of room to put a folder and other papers. We even made name tags and attached them with brads. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: Great buy: Looks great, sturdy, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Looks professional and quite sturdy. I wish it was just a little bit wider so it could hold wider magazines like shotgun news, army times, and newspapers, and a bit deeper so it could hold more issues, but for standard size magazines it's great. Came with drywall anchors and a mounting template that made it super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: deus402

customer_reviews.title: Magazine rack is a great way to organize magazines and keep piles off the ...
customer_reviews.text: Magazine rack is a great way to organize magazines and keep piles off the floor - others can pick what they want to read - each slot holds several magazines. I bought it for my office hideway
customer_reviews.author: Holly T.

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than just magazines
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work to hold invoices as they arrive. It installed easily, comes up high enough to hold the invoices without them drooping but still allows me to see what is in the pocket. I actually went back and ordered another one because of how convenient they are.
customer_reviews.author: baabaa

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Fits our needs very well, but would like to have an anchor on the bottom, as well (and the way it is constructed doesn't allow for a simple screw to do the trick). Ended up adding L brackets to each side and a couple of the bottom for extra stability, but it is a visible fix.
customer_reviews.author: Tante Emma

customer_reviews.title: sturdy as hell
customer_reviews.text: this rack looks great in my studio and is sturdy as hell. easy to put up. I've always wanted one so when folks are in the studio just chillin' you can stop looking so silly and goofy in the face and pick up one of my many cool ass magazines to keep busy. feel me. yeah you feel me....

A relative came to visit and had to pull their spouse into the bathroom and say, "This is what I want!" It is durable and looks nice.

customer_reviews.title: Works great not as rugged as expected

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great place to keep magazines displayed and easy to find without the clutter!

customer_reviews.title: Great product, though a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product so that I could have an inventive and more stylish way to store comic issues that I am currently collecting, and for that purpose, it works great. It is much heavier than I expected it to be, and since the wall hooks are so extreme and I live in an apartment, I'm not really able to hang it on the wall. It's fine sitting for now however, and it looks really modern which I love. I know by how tough the mesh is that it will last me years to come, so one day, when I can make huge holes in the wall, I'll hang her up. :)
customer_reviews.author: FictionReborn

customer_reviews.title: Good magazine rack
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered this magazine rack to hold his woodworking magazines in his workshop. It was longer than we expected. But by the time he got it loaded with his magazines, it wasn't too big -- about right. My husband likes it.

product_meta.title: Safco Products Onyx 5 Pocket Magazine Rack 5578BL, Black Powder Coat Finish, Durable Commercial-Steel Construction
product_meta.description:
Style:5 PocketOnyx 5 Pocket Magazine Rack creates an eye-catching, clutter-free wall display of magazines, journals and bulletins in lobbies and common areas. Durable, powder coat finish on the commercial-grade steel frame helps resist chipping or scratching while the steel mesh pocket design promotes air flow to reduce dust buildup. Each pocket holds 3/4" of printed materials or up to 5 lbs. Ideal for use in private offices, collaborative spaces, hospitality areas, lobbies, libraries, classrooms—anyplace that could benefit from stylish, space-saving organization. Wall rack mounts flush to the wall with the mounting hardware included. The Onyx Family includes a diverse collection of stylishly-designed steel mesh products, from desktop organizers to machine stands. Onyx makes it easy to create a sleek, professional, organized workspace.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ideal for waiting rooms and offices, the Safco Mesh Magazine Rack comes with five pockets and black mesh construction. Sized to fit most magazines, this rack's black mesh design adds a contemporary edge and easy visibility to the reading material. Ideal for a front office or reception area to create a positive first impression, this magazine rack measures 3-1/2 x 9-3/4 x 28 inches and comes with mounting hardware.
feature_bullets: WALL DISPLAY. Onyx 5 Pocket Magazine Rack creates an eye-catching, clutter-free wall display of magazines, journals and bulletins in lobbies and common areas. Each pocket holds 3/4" of printed materials or up to 5 lbs.
LONG-LASTING QUALITY. Durable, powder coat finish on the commercial-grade steel frame helps resist chipping or scratching while the steel mesh design promotes air flow to reduce dust buildup.
PRODUCT DIMENSIONS. Wall rack measures 10 1⁄4"W x 3 1/2"D x 28"H and mounts flush to the wall with the mounting hardware included. Product weight: 3.6 lbs.
APPLICATIONS. Ideal for use in private offices, collaborative spaces, hospitality areas, lobbies, libraries, classrooms—anyplace that could benefit from stylish, space-saving organization.

GREENGUARD Certified products are scientifically proven to meet some of the world’s most rigorous, third-party chemical emissions standards—helping reduce indoor air pollution and the risk of chemical exposure to help create healthier indoor environments.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars224 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
